akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The provisions of this subchapter and any sanctions imposed pursuant to this subchapter shall terminate on the date on which the President submits to the appropriate congressional committees—
(b) Certification described A certification described in this subsection is a certification by the President that the Government of Syria—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Suspension of sanctions after election of democratic government

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Suspension of sanctions after election of democratic government If the President submits to the appropriate congressional committees the certification described in subsection (a)(2), the President may suspend the provisions of this subchapter and any sanctions imposed under this subchapter for not more than 180 days to allow time for a certification described in subsection (b) to be submitted.
